text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a MPROT

name: ActClassMonitoringProgram
title: ActClassMonitoringProgram
description: An officially or unofficially instituted program to track acts of a particular type or categorization.
